sections.text: The Vanderbilt M.Eng. programs emphasize advanced technical preparation and professional practice across engineering disciplines.
Students complete advanced engineering coursework tailored to discipline plus practice‑oriented experiences.

items: Bachelor’s degree in engineering or related STEM
Minimum B average in undergraduate coursework
sections.text: Applicants must have an engineering or STEM background with solid academics; GRE is not required.
Graduates pursue professional engineering practice, management, or doctoral study.
